title: Ernst Starvo Blofeld

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - 3 times per game, Pick a player, you will roleblock, poison, and blackmail them. You cannot do this to any other SPECTRE members

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- On day 1, select a scheme.
- You are the only SPECTRE role without a scheme.

desc:
Post 4177
*The things that bring people together. Out of horror, beauty.*
